Seoul has such a place called the "citizen forest", there are beautiful scenery all year round, in the warm spring, the river is full of pink cherry blossoms, stretching hundreds of meters. The cherry trees on both sides of the river are woven into a beautiful picture. Not only can you ride leisurely, or you can hang out with three or five friends in the afternoon. I want to enjoy the beautiful cherry blossoms with him or her, but I don’t want to be disturbed by the crowd. It’s a good place to go!
